rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm so happy. I feel like I'm seeing
more smiles lately, both from all of
you and the people in the capital.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0004
rows.name:
This is the way of Iira,
which advocates for the coexistence
of humans and Blades.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0006
rows.name:
I get the feeling Iira treats
us Blades differently than
other countries.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0008
rows.name:
You're the jewel of Superbia,
Kagutsuchi. People probably respect you
no matter where you go.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0011
rows.name:
I don't need to hear that from
the Heaven's Holy Grail. It's not like
you've noticed either, have you?

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0013
rows.name:
Alright, that's enough.
Cut it out, you two.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm going to head to the palace
and check for any new intel
on Metsu's movements.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0017
rows.name:
I trust Marveni's intel,
but the fact that there's been
no movement yet is bothering me.
